document_data.mainbody:
Dora Stonethrow was a dwarf barmaid inhabiting the city of Zhentil Keep during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Doras crimson beard was matched by her fiery personality.
She worked in the Tesh-Wave, a tavern located on the waterfront in Zhentil Keeps Foreign Quarter. Dora was the taverns arm-wrestling champion.
